mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT orderNum, email, storeName, tableNum, menu, count, price, amount FROM order_ WHERE email = #{email } GROUP BY orderNum, email, storeName, tableNum, menu, count, price, amount ORDER BY orderNum DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_ (orderNum, email, storeName, tableNum, menu, count, price, amount, regdate) VALUES(#{orderNum },#{email }, #{storeName }, #{tableNum }, #{menu }, #{count }, #{price },#{amount }, SYSDATE)
